page.title: 16CHELMARSH VILLAGE FETE
page.content: During the middle of July each year a village fete is held in Chelmarsh.It takes place on a Saturday and each year there are more attractions to entertain the people and to raise money.The money raised goes towards a fund used to maintain the village hall which is run by a management committee. In 1985 there were such attractions as a miniature steam traction engine,archery,fire engine,inflatable fun castle,pony rides,baby show,painting competition,barbecue,vintage motorcycles,morris dancers,tug of war and Punch and Judy. Many people turned up and had a very interesting afternoon.
